profile.name: Susan Khadka
profile.description: Dedicated and innovative Full Stack Developer with a strong foundation in web development and a passion for building user-friendly and efficient software solutions.

tasks: Streamlined responsive frontend interfaces using Next.js, resulting in a 30% improvement in cross-browser compatibility.
Spearheaded the implementation of Next Auth, enhancing security and user experience with magic link logins and Google sign-in.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop a comprehensive web application from the ground up, resulting in a 20% reduction in development time.
Architected an enterprise-level software solution using Flutter, integrating core business processes and achieving a 30% increase in operational efficiency.
Optimized RESTful API consumption and state management, resulting in a 25% reduction in data transfer time and increased app performance.

Orchestrated a seamless integration of push notifications into the existing mobile app infrastructure, leading to a significant rise in user engagement, with daily active users increasing by 1,000 within the first month.
Mentored interns, conduct code reviews, and established best practices, leading to a 15% increase in team productivity and code quality.
Developed responsive frontend interfaces with React.js, improving user experience across devices and increasing mobile traffic by 15%.
Engineered efficient RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express.js, reducing server response time by 20%.
Implemented version control best practices using Git, streamlining team collaboration and reducing merge conflicts.

projects.title: Social Hub
projects.description: Social Hub is a dynamic social community based platform designed to provide users with a Reddit-like experience. It helps users to connect with people of similar interests and hobbies.

projects.title: Taskboard
projects.description: TaskBoard is a simple and effective task management system that allows organizations to register and manage their employees efficiently.

projects.title: Bloomsphere
projects.description: This project is a personal blog platform with responsive design and robust, to easily create and manage my own blogs with markdown files. Leveraging the simplicity and versatility of markdown.

projects.title: Sahayata Setu
projects.description: Android application that connects donors, beneficiaries, volunteer and NGO's on a single platform.

awards.event: Azadi Ka Amrit Mahotsav Hackathon 2022 - Appreciation
points: Led a high-performing team to victory, securing second place among 2500+ competitors by developing an innovative solution for non-monetary donations.
